articles.title: Connecting Search Console to Data Studio
articles.description:
This post is the first in a series of posts that will focus on exporting, enhancing, and visualizing Search Console data using Google Data Studio. Today's post discusses
 how to bring Search Console data into Google Data Studio, including an example where we …
articles.content:
Tuesday, March 08, 2022
Google Search Console gives you insight into your website performance in Google Search,
